COMMAND.NAME: autoindent
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferName The unique name of an e93 buffer.
COMMAND.SUMMARY: Indent by the same amount of white space as the previous line
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Delete all selected characters in bufferName insert a new line, then move over by the amount of white space that is contained at the start of the previous line.
COMMAND.STATUS:
The autoindent command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer.
